com.barryholroyd.walmartproducts

Class Support

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barryholroyd.walmartproducts.Support

  • public class Support
extends java.lang.Object
    Common support for both activities.
    Author:
    Barry Holroyd

    • Field Detail

      • KEY_PRODUCTID

        private static java.lang.String KEY_PRODUCTID
        "Intent extra" key: identifies product when starting ActivityProductInfo activity.

      • a

        private static android.app.Activity a
        This is a handle to the current activity. It must be set in a constructor because the Activity instance hasn't yet been created a static initialization time.

        This would cause a memory leak after each device configuration change, except that it is re-initialized by each activity upon start up.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Support

        Support(android.app.Activity _a)

      • htmlToText

        public static java.lang.String htmlToText(java.lang.String in)
        Translate HTML tags (embedded in text) to simple text. Poor man's version -- mostly, just removes tags.
        Parameters:
        in - input text (e.g., pulled from JSON).
        Returns:
        output text (without HTML tags).
